6
7 BlockDC::BlockDC()
8 : sample_rate(0.0),
9 R(0.0),
10 xz1(0.0),
11 yz1(0.0)
12 {
13 }
14
15 void BlockDC::reset(double _sample_rate)
16 {
17 xz1 = 0.0;
18 yz1 = 0.0;
19
20 sample_rate = _sample_rate;
21 }
22
23 void BlockDC::set_cutoff(double frequency)
24 {
25 R = 1 - (consts::TWO_PI * frequency / sample_rate);
26 }
27
28 double BlockDC::process(double x)
29 {
30 const double y = x - xz1 + R * yz1;
31
32 xz1 = x;
33 yz1 = y;
34
35 return y;
36 }

38} // namespace xdsp::filter
